channel.title: Dotfile on mkBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Dotfile on mkBlog

item.title: macdotfile
item.description: 关闭 sip csrutil disable 下载字体 brew tap homebrew/cask-fonts && brew install --cask font-meslo-lg-nerd-font MesloLGM Nerd Font Mono 安装软件 fedora dnf install fish chsh -s /usr/bin/fish git clone https://github.com/mkeco/dotfile.git ~/.config sudo dnf install navi lsd neovim conda -y mac sudo visudo -f /private/etc/sudoers.d/yabai # input the line below into the file you are editing. # replace <yabai> with the path to the yabai binary (output of: which yabai). # replace <user> with your username (output of: whoami).
